sentences.sentence: He was quick to exploit those who fell under his sway.
sentences.translation: 他毫不犹豫地利用受他控制的那些人。

sentences.sentence: A hard-core group of right-wing senators had hoped to sway their colleagues.
sentences.translation: 一群骨干右翼参议员曾企图左右他们的同事。

sentences.sentence: Rebel forces hold sway over much of the island.
sentences.translation: 该岛很大一部分控制在叛军手里。
